desc:
Please create a version system for documents in VaultWorks. Basically, they will have an option on the document information modal to upload a new version of the same document (a button called "Upload New Version").

This will then create a new version in the database and "hide" the previous file from the grid of documents. It can however be found under the "Previous Versions" tab on the document information modal.
name: VW - Document Versioning
